googleSheetsTriggerOAuth2Api.name: Google Sheets Trigger account - DT AFT

parameters.content:
## Flow 1: Contract Creation System
This flow activates when you mark a deal as "Closed?" in your CRM.

attributes.name: Project Title
attributes.description: Project Title (keep in mind this is for a contract, so everything should look clean and professional)

attributes.name: Project.Fee
attributes.description: Project Fee (keep in mind this is for a contract, so everything should look clean and professional)

attributes.name: Deposit %, milestone amounts, due dates
attributes.description: We have two milestones, each with a deposit percentage and a due date. Please structure them clearly, as they will be included in a single line of the contract.

attributes.name: Start Date
attributes.description: =A week from {{$now}} - we need to specify an **exact date**  for that (no time required).

attributes.name: Estimated Completion Date
attributes.description: Estimated completion date - this is usually based on what we discussed during the call at the start of the project. The project start date serves as the official start date.

attributes.name: Ongoing monthly maintenance
attributes.description: If a specific monthly cost was mentioned, use that amount from the call extract and label it as monthly ongoing maintenance. If it wasn't mentioned, default to $700 per month

attributes.name: Project Scope
attributes.description: Describe the project scope in a structured and concise way, as it will be placed above the project deliverables in the contract.

attributes.name: Project Deliverables
attributes.description: Describe the project deliverables concisely, as they will be listed underneath the project scope.

attributes.name: Functionality System Must Have
attributes.description: Describe or state concisely what functionality the system must have. Keep in mind that this will be placed above the "Functionality to Meet Acceptance Criteria" field.

attributes.name: Functionality To Meet Acceptance
attributes.description: Describe or state concisely what functionality the system must have to meet the acceptance criteria. Keep in mind that this section will be placed underneath the functionality.

attributes.name: Milestone One
attributes.description: Since payment is based on milestones and we have two in total, state Milestone One concisely and clearly.

attributes.name: Milestone one payment percent
attributes.description: What will be the payment percentage for Milestone One? If nothing is mentioned, default to 50%.

attributes.name: Milestone One Due Date
attributes.description: The due date for Milestone One should be based on the conversation. Estimate how long it will take to reach Milestone One and add that duration to the extracted dates.

attributes.name: Milestone two
attributes.description: Since payment is based on milestones and we have two in total, state Milestone Two concisely and clearly.

attributes.name: Milestone Two Payment Percent
attributes.description: What will be the payment percentage for Milestone Two? If nothing is mentioned, default to 50%.

attributes.name: Milestone Two Due Date
attributes.description: The due date for Milestone Two should be based on the conversation. Estimate how long it will take to reach Milestone Two and add that duration to the extracted dates.

parameters.subject: =Please review the contract for {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Company Name'] }}
parameters.message:
= Document Review Request
You need to review a [DEV] Contract for {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Company Name'] }} .

parameters.content:
## Flow 2: Contract Signed Monitoring System
This flow runs every hour to check for newly signed contracts and welcome new clients.

parameters.subject: Welcome to Dhimahi Technolabs
parameters.message:
We are thrilled to welcome you to Dhimahi Technolabs and are excited to kick off our partnership! We're committed to helping you achieve your goals with our innovative solutions.

Here's what you can expect next:
- Kickoff meeting: Let's connect to discuss your goals and expectations. You can book a time that works for you here: https://calendly.com/dhimahitechnolabs/onboarding-call

- Your point of contact: Your dedicated Account Manager. They'll reach out within 24 hours to introduce themselves and be your go-to for any questions.

We've also prepared some resources to help you get familiar with our process:
- Onboarding guide: [Link]
- FAQ page: [Link]

We're here to help you succeed, and we look forward to a successful partnership.

Best regards,
Dhimahi Technolabs

parameters.content:
## Flow 3: Onboarding Call Folder Creation
This flow creates a Google Drive folder when a client books an onboarding call.

nodes.name: If an onboarding call is booked

parameters.subject: =New onboarding call booked by {{ $('Get company name').item.json['Company Name'] }} (folder created)
parameters.message:
={{ $('Get company name').item.json['Company Name'] }} booked an onboarding call at {{ $('Calendly Trigger').item.json.payload.scheduled_event.start_time.toDateTime().toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd h:mm a') }}.

Here's the folder for {{ $('Get company name').item.json['Company Name'] }}: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/{{ $json.id }}

nodes.name: Send a call and folder confirmation email

main.node: If an onboarding call is booked
Send a call and folder confirmation email
